resources.string: Thank you for participating in the statistics! To view the statistics, tap on the title bar.
In order to give more comprehesive statistics to the World, please share the link of the application with your friends.
The Andralytics app collecting anonym usage statistics using the Google Analytics services. To read full license of Google Analytics click link below.
Join Android community statistics! Checkout the Andralytics site for more information:
Join Android community statistics...Download Andralytics app from Market:
